data.oai_dc:dc: Divergence statistics for the four species that were de novo assembled (P. trichocarpa, P. balsamifera, P. fremontii, Salix interior). These were calculated using scripts "parse_fasta_to_genes.pl" and "diffs.pl" from https://github.com/daisieh/phylogenomics/releases/tag/v1.01-nph
Natural Selection and Contemporary Evolution|Molecular Evolution|Speciation|Genomics/Proteomics
